price: Then proclaim what you are commanded, and turn away from those who associate partners with Allah.
arabic: فَٱصۡدَعۡ بِمَا تُؤۡمَرُ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
